rule_description: Users cannot both create and approve invoices
risk_description: Allows user to create and approve fraudulent invoices

rule_description: Users cannot both create and approve fuel orders
risk_description: Allows user to create and approve unauthorized orders

rule_name: Master Data Edit vs Finance Post
rule_description: Users cannot both edit master data and post to finance
risk_description: Allows manipulation of prices before financial posting

rule_description: Users cannot both capture ePOD and verify invoices
risk_description: Allows user to manipulate delivery quantities and verify

rule_description: Users cannot have both user admin and full security admin
Users cannot both manage contracts and post to finance
risk_description: Allows manipulation of contract terms and pricing
